name: Battle Royale: Survivors
description: SURVIVORS: Battle Royale is a last-man-standing third person shooter game. Players are taken as prisoners and thrown to an abandoned island. The game supports up to 100 players. (25 players in Early Access and grows) Players must fight with whaterever they can find on the island. They will seek for weapons ( e.g. pistols,  shotguns, assualt rifles), equipments (e.g. Helmet, Vest) and supplies (e.g. bandages). They can play aggressively by attacking others and rob their items or hiding. The choice is yours. Whoever survivals to be the last lone survior wins the game.
